class.name: VisibilityNotifier
class.brief_description: Detect when the node is visible on screen.
class.description: The VisibilityNotifier is used to notify when its bounding box enters the screen, is visible on the screen, or when it exits the screen.

method.name: get_aabb
method.description: Return the visibility bounding box of the VisibilityNotifier.

method.name: is_on_screen
method.description: Return true if any part of the bounding box is on the screen.

method.name: set_aabb
method.description: Set the visibility bounding box of the VisibilityNotifier.

signal.name: enter_camera
signal.description: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier enters a [Camera]'s view.

signal.name: enter_screen
signal.description: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier enters the screen.

signal.name: exit_camera
signal.description: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier exits a [Camera]'s view.

signal.name: exit_screen
signal.description: Emitted when the VisibilityNotifier exits the screen.
